channel.title: Problems with 16.0.2.7
channel.description:
I build 16.0.2.7 from sources (not modified)
Gateway: Not run display manager with 512MiB memory. And console login not run. With 768MiB display manager work fine.
Gateway and Workstation: Cannot boot in live mode with any RAM (512, 768, 1024, 2048).
I build 15.0.1.9.3 version from sources, and it work fine. Problem only in 16.0.2.7 (and 16.0.1.7, and probably 16.* versions)

item.description:

item.title: Problems with 16.0.2.7
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
pushup via Whonix Forum:

Gateway and Workstation:
Cannot boot in live mode with any RAM (512, 768, 1024, 2048).

Confirmed.

Unspecific to Whonix KVM.

Please 1 issue = 1 forum thread.

Bullseye: live-boot needs GRUB_DISABLE_LINUX_UUID="true" parameter in /etc/grub.d/11_linux_live Development
grub-live broken in Whonix 16 has been Released! (Debian 11 bullseye based) - for VirtualBox - Major Release. Actually requiredâ€¦ Debian bug report: kernel command line (grub) UUID=... and PARTUUID=... Can not mount on filesystem /run/live/rootfs/filesystem since Debian bullseye https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=994138

Read full topic
